alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Montgomery; Toombs; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 6:35PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Toombs, south central Emanuel, southeastern Wheeler and Montgomery Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 634 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from 6 miles east of Normantown to near Hazlehurst, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Uvalda, Oak Park, Ailey, Higgston, Santa Claus, Alston, Center, Toombs Central, Ohoopee, New Branch, Ponderosa, McNatt Falls, South Thompson, English Eddy, Grays Landing, Rock Springs and Cedar Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency.
